class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 28 - July 1, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Summer. Development of fluency in the spoken language through discussion of contemporary issues in French culture. Emphasis on increasing vocabulary and ease in the manipulation of grammatical structures.
